Name: Petal Dance
Description: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def.

Name: Earth Power
Description: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense.

Name: Waterfall
Description: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Psywave
Description: Does damage equal to the user's level.

Name: Wild Charge
Description: Has 1/3 recoil. 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Iron Tail
Description: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense.

Name: Rock Smash
Description: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense.

Name: Stockpile
Description: Raises the your Pokemon's Defense and Sp. Def by 1 each.

Name: Yawn
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Blaze Kick
Description: High critical hit ratio. 30% chance to burn the target.

Name: Hyper Voice
Description: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense.

Name: Air Slash
Description: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Flash Cannon
Description: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense.

Name: Extrasensory
Description: 30% chance to make the target flinch. Double damage to Minimized targets.

Name: Poison Tail
Description: 30% change to badly poison the target.
